name: Grunkle Stan vs White Supremacy
description:
Give it a minute to load. 

Game by Aquma, art & animation by Paul Robertson, Grunkle Sam character by Alex Hirsch, song is Killing in the Name by Rage Against the Machine as arranged and performed by 8-bit Universe.

Inspired by this Twitter thread.

Press any key to punch Hitler, a Klan Member, and the most dangerous white supremacist supporter of them all: Trump. Don't stop 'til you've punched them all. 

I'm reclaiming my time.
